alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Hutchinson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 5:30PM MDT until June 20 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL DOUGLAS AND WESTERN HUTCHINSON COUNTIES... At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Parkston, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 618 PM, A 70 MPH WIND GUST WAS RECORDED 1 MILE NORTHWEST OF TRIPP. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Dimock and Milltown around 640 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
